refnamediv.refpurpose: Transfer control during the performance-time passes.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: During the p-time passes only, unconditionally transfer control to the statement labeled by label.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.para: where label is in the same instrument block and is not an expression.

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para:
Here is an example of the kgoto opcode. It uses the file kgoto.csd.
Example of the kgoto opcode.
See the sections Real-time Audio and Command Line Flags for more information on using command line flags.
Its output should include lines like this:
kval = 0.000000, kfreq = 440.000000 kval = 0.999732, kfreq = 440.000000 kval = 1.999639, kfreq = 880.000000
